message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: Iterator<T> iterator = set.iterator();
while (iterator.hasNext()) {
  E e = iterator.next();
  makeRepresentative(e);
  iterator.remove();
  set.removeAll(AllPlayersOnSameTeamAs(e));
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can create an iterator outside of the while loop and use it to iterate over the set. This way, you don't need to create a new iterator in every step of the while loop. Additionally, you can use the iterator's remove() method to remove elements from the set while iterating. Finally, you can use the set's removeAll() method to remove all players on the same team as the representative.
